mapper.select: select u.name, c.* from tbl_user u join TBL_COMMENT c on u.USER_ID =c.USER_ID and COMMUNITY_ID = #{community_Id} order by COMMENT_UPDATE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: insert into TBL_COMMENT (COMMENT_ID, COMMUNITY_ID, USER_ID, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_REGISTER_DATE, COMMENT_UPDATE_DATE) values (seq_comment.nextval, #{communityId}, #{userId}, #{commentContent}, sysdate, sysdate)
